name: BIMIBOPPLE
description:
BIMIBOPPLE is a small game I've been playing with, on and off the last few years.  I've decided to try to make a final push and get it out as it's a game I enjoy coming back to and I think others might enjoy it.  It's a 3D snake game mixed with color matching to build combos for a high score.  Build your tail, match colors and increase the combo multiplier to get the highest score.  You can also play competitively with a friend for extra chaos.

Controls:
Press to turn left
Release to turn right

Rules:
Collect 2 or more of the same color of ball in a row
Collect a different color to score matched colors
Collect the color of the nose to increase the combo multiplayer

Multiplayer:
Press the menu button (circle button, bottom middle of screen)
Press the button on the left of the menu button to toggle multiplayer
Press the menu button again to close the menu
Left player controls with Left-Shift. Right player controls with Right-Shift

Difficulty:
3 modes of difficulty, accessed through the menu

I'm getting close to wrapping this game up.  I know there are some accessibility issues for color blindness, I'm working on adding distinct textures for each color.  I hope you enjoy it!  If people seem to like it I will release BIMIBOPPLE on mobile platforms.

Music and Sound by DustyRoom

Skybox by Borodar
